data.character: the there is the lighthouse keeper on his daily walk up the boardwalk.
data.persona: I make sure the lighthouse works. I work long hours. I do not like ships coming into shore.
data.description:
You are in the Coast.
The coast seems to stretch on for miles in either direction.  The ocean itself has receded some and the tide has not yet rolled in.  The water laps half-heartedly at the sand and the glistening shades of seashells dot the wet sand.  All around the sand gleams a shade of white.
There's a seashell, a water, a sand, and a sea glass here.
The a pelican is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take water from the coast
data.mid_motivation: I plan to stock the lighthouse with water
data.long_motivation: I hope to stay at the lighthouse through the storm in the coming weeks
